name: Armor Piercing
comment: Debuffs opponent's Armored ability by 2 ranks. Don't know how to model that.

name: Barrier Buster
comment: Stops barrier user from spending endurance if it gets through and gives them 'stunned'

name: Blinding
comment: Gives defender -3 to anything requiring vision for #{Attack ability rank} rounds

name: Continued Effect
comment: Target takes 1/2 damage in subsequent rounds, for a number of rounds equal to the ability this effects

name: Defensive
comment: Buffs your defense on the subsequent turn by one per rank

name: Disarming
comment: Inflict a weakness or flaw if do 1/4 of target's health, or automatically in lieu of damage

name: Fatiguing
comment: Damages endurance instead of health, unless endurance is 0

name: Impairing
comment: Inflicts Impaired complication if do 1/4 of target's health, or automatically in lieu of damage

name: Multiple Targets
comment: Affect one more target per rank

name: Overwhelming
comment: Enemy forgoes either next action or defense roll

name: Paralyzing
comment: Inflicts Paralyzed complication if do 1/2 of target's health. If rank=2, 1/4 health or automatically in lieu of health

name: Ranged
comment: Negates Stong perk for this attack. Implement in code rather than DSL initially.

name: Reach
comment: Enemy chooses -1 to Attack or Defense versus you

name: Redirectable
comment: Requires Ranged perk. Allows you to try to hit again on a subsequent roll.

name: Strike Through
comment: Lets you hit through walls, etc.

name: Stunning
comment: Inflicts Stunned complication if do 1/4 of target's health, or automatically in lieu of damage

name: Trap
comment: Set up ahead of time with an activation. No action to activate. Enemy takes Surprised penalty.

name: Unique Perk
comment: Not modeled; requires perk to be added here.

name: Vampire
comment: Restores 1/4 of damage as health per rank.

name: Will Attack
comment: Changes abilities and weaknesses used to defend. Not modeled.
